attr.title: Minecraft - Java Edition
attr.desc:
Minecraft is a game where you can do pretty much whatever you want. Want to build a giant castle? Go for it. Feel like exploring caves and fighting skeletons? Totally an option. You start in a big, blocky world with nothing, and little by little, you gather, build, explore, and create your own adventures. Whether you're surviving the night or just chilling in Creative mode building dream houses, itâ€™s a game about freedom, creativity, and having fun your own way.

Not all versions are Supported, currently only 1.7.10 (with Forge), 1.13 and 1.16.5 (Fabric only) are supported
attr.inst:
Install the offical Minecraft Launcher on your PC and then install the version that you want to play, so for example for 1.7.10 Install that but also if you want to use forge install that too
After that Copy the .minecraft folder which is normally placed in %appdata% ( you can access that on windows by pressing WIN + R and then typing %appdata% ) to your minecraftjava folder on your device
